long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now in Open Beta! nekoboom.com

Customize your web experience with cute characters from Neko Boom!

Boost your productivity by using screen recorder and image to text. Reminders to stretch and blink.

Take a break by playing games 🙂

Games:
💣💣⭐Dodge Bombs & Collect Stars!
🐵🐵🐵Shoot bombs at dancing monkies

Productivity:
🎥 Screen Recorder ~Record your screen and download right in your browser
📋Image to Text (Experimental) ~Take a screenshot of an image with text to quickly copy & paste

To play games & unlock more characters please visit:
https://nekoboom.com/
